titles.title: Designating the Russian Federation as a State Sponsor of Terrorism Act
Designating the Russian Federation as a State Sponsor of Terrorism Act
A bill to provide for the designation of the Russian Federation as a state sponsor of terrorism.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 160.
